response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, but its true worth to you is even greater. We understand its significance and would like to offer it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is an opportunity not just to own a valuable asset, but to make a wise investment that could potentially increase in value over time. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 1200000}
